methods.name: addToOperatorCommit
methods.desc: Used by the node operator to add to his stake amount for the node

methods.name: removeFromOperatorCommit
methods.desc: Used by the node operator to remove from his stake amount for the node

args.name: claimRequest
args.desc: amount claimed by the node operator to be removed from the contract balance and subtracted from the operator_commit counter

methods.name: goOnline
methods.desc: Used to set the Contract account online for consensus. Always check that account is online and incentivesEligible before having delegatable stake

args.name: feePayment
args.desc: Payment transaction to the contract to cover costs for Eligibility fee 0 for renewal.

args.name: voteFirst
args.desc: Index of first valid block for the participation keys

args.name: voteLast
args.desc: Index of last valid block for for the participation keys

methods.name: goOffline
methods.desc:
Set the contract account to offline so that it doesn't participate in consensus anymore.
No force offline by the protocol. Lookup Delinquency status
Once the account is set offline the method ensures that it cannot be delegated to.
